message: hey friends, any ideas on how to detect when I'm running "manage.py test" so I can swap out services like redis/solr to be testing instances instead of production ones?
ah, okay, thanks. If I have to change the command I'll probably just use an environment variable.
Is there a simple way to detect when being run in tests?
You can specify an alternate settings file when running management commands.  --settings=foo
but that approach could also work!
You can also monkey patch mock objects that follow a similar API if it's not something simple like a db backend or a cache backend
